about_the_game:
Experience the blast of synths like never before with this new official soundtrack composed by the renowned Synthwave artist, Spaceinvader!

Contains 9 official tracks as heard in game, in both a lightweight .mp3 format and lossless .wav format. Contains the official album art in a .png format.

Also available on most major streaming services world wide.

Purchase this album with Outmode at a third of the price of retail!
